mapper.insert: insert into EMP values( #{ empId }, #{ empPwd }, #{ empName }, #{ empAddr1 }, #{ empAddr2 }, #{ empAddr3 }, #{ empPhone }, default, #{ status } )
mapper.select: select emp_id AS empId, emp_name AS empName, emp_pwd AS empPWD, addr1 AS empAddr1, addr2 AS empAddr2, addr3 AS empAddr3, phone AS empPhone, enroll_date AS empEnrollDate, status AS status from emp where emp_id = #{ empId }
mapper.update:
update emp
emp_id = #{ empId },
emp_pwd = #{ empPwd },
emp_name = #{ empName },
addr1 = #{ empAddr1 },
addr2 = #{ empAddr2 },
addr3 = #{ empAddr3 },
phone = #{ empPhone },
status = #{ status }
where emp_id = #{ empId }
mapper.delete: delete from emp where emp_id = #{ empId }
